segments.text: I feel happy watching the children, even if they’re being sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really going for those cookies, and it’s kind of funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely oblivious, and it’s almost charming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is everywhere, but it’s not ruining the mood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will notice before the stool tips over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, and it matches the happy feeling inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn’t fall, but even if he does, it’ll be a funny story.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just delightful to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
